txt.en: 'Hello again, [placeholder], interested in another adventure? I have something for which you seem well-suited.\n\n'In the ruins of Dol Ernil, the Dead have taken over and must be dealt a blow. Go there and eliminate the gaunt-men who take residence in the former halls of power.'
You have eliminated the enemy within the ruin. Now you should return to the mission giver and tell them of your victory.
Within the ruins of a once great hall, the Dead now make their home. You are asked to venture into the ruins and purge the Dead within.
'Prepared to go? The dead will not wait. Their number will grow if we are not swift to strike them down. I wish you luck.'
'I knew you would move swiftly. You are a hero to us all, [placeholder]. As ever, we welcome your assistance and reward you for your efforts.'
There is no twist in this mission.
'Are you certain you are prepared? It is certain the Dead that linger there will be. I wish you much luck, friend.'
Complete the Mission: Haunting at Dol Ernil
Within the walls of Dol Ernil, the gaunt-men take residence where they should not be. It falls to you to enter the ruins and destroy the foe there.
